sections.text:
66-1106.Development and production of geothermal resources; provisions applicable.

The development and production of geothermal resources shall be subject to Chapter 46, article 6, and the Environmental Protection Act and any rules and regulations adopted thereunder.

SourceLaws 1982, LB 708, ยง 6.

Cross ReferencesEnvironmental Protection Act, see section 81-1532.
